Internship and Career Center


                  Recruit an Aggie
              











Recruit Aggies
Welcome to the UC Davis Internship and Career Center.
Thank you for your interest in recruiting UC Davis students and alumni. The Internship and Career Center looks forward to connecting you with Aggies. Here are the ways to recruit at UC Davis:
Create a Handshake account and post a position
Internship and Career Fairs
Interviews
Information Sessions
Networking Opportunities
Federal Work-Study Experiment

Directions to UC Davis
Aggies Hiring Aggies

We encourage UC Davis alumni to hire current Aggies. Learn more about resources for Aggies Hiring Aggies.
